title: The Dr Power Mysteries
description: The Dr Power Mysteries is a compendium volume of the acclaimed first three Dr Power novels, by Hugh Greene. They feature the psychiatrist Dr Power and his colleague Superintendent Lynch as they solve murders and crime. The volume contains The Darkening Sky, The Fire of Love and The Good Shepherd. All books feature the detective Superintendent Lynch and psychiatrist Dr Carl Power. All books have earned 4 or more stars on Goodreads.The series is illustrated by Paul Imrie.
author: Hugh  Greene
